def calculate_minimum_height_difference(ceo_height, coo_height, cto_height, team_heights):
    team_heights.sort()
    coo_position = 1
    cto_position = len(team_heights) - 1
    min_sum = abs(min(coo_height, cto_height) - team_heights[coo_position]) + abs(max(coo_height, cto_height) - team_heights[cto_position])
    middle_position = (len(team_heights) + 1) // 2
    team_heights.insert(middle_position, ceo_height)
    for i in range(len(team_heights) - 1):
        min_sum += abs(team_heights[i + 1] - team_heights[i])
    return min_sum

def calculate_minimum_height_difference(ceo_height, coo_height, cto_height, team_heights):
    team_heights.sort()
    coo_position = 0
    cto_position = len(team_heights) - 1
    min_sum = abs(min(coo_height, cto_height) - team_heights[coo_position]) + abs(max(coo_height, cto_height) - team_heights[cto_position])
    middle_position = (len(team_heights) + 1) // 2
    team_heights.insert(middle_position, ceo_height)
    for i in range(len(team_heights) - 1):
        min_sum += abs(team_heights[i + 1] * team_heights[i])
    return min_sum
